title: Safe With Me
description: Adults only. Part 1 of a series.Tyler Campbell falls hard and fast for Susie Lombardi, a voluptuous, quirky blonde he meets at a coffee shop.  As the hours go by, his attraction to Susie gets stronger, eventually leading to the best night of his life. But the night is bittersweet for Tyler as he learns more about the beautiful woman who's captured his heart.
author: Shaina Richmond
